portfolio.span_1: This section is limited to displaying information intended for public viewing. Topics such as education, cv, and personal information are only sent privately.
portfolio.main:
Hi! I'm Esteban Gonzalez, a backend-specialized developer with a strong full-stack background. I've been implementing solutions professionally since 2022, with a strong focus on excellence and minimalism.

From the start, I've been a disciplined self-learner, with a rigorous approach to mastering every topic I study. I'm currently a Software Engineering student, which has further broadened my perspective and shaped me into a well-rounded professional. I'm constantly evolving, facing challenges that strengthen my skills and allow me to gain valuable experience.

My main specialization is server-side development. I manage a broad and current tech stack, with competencies that allow me to design, build, and maintain efficient, secure, and scalable backend systems. However, I don't limit myself to this area: my versatile approach has led me to participate in frontend projects, desktop applications, DevOps, system administration, video game development, bots, and more.

I understand that programming is a vast universe with common fundamentals, which allows me to quickly adapt to different environments and technologies. I possess solid logic oriented towards solving problems in a structured way and building robust, high-quality solutions.

Additionally, I actively collaborate on open-source projects and participate in various tech communities, where I share knowledge and learn from other professionals.

I'm looking for new opportunities where I can continue to grow, contribute my experience and passion, and face new challenges alongside teams that value continuous learning and technical excellence.

backend.title: Backend
items: Design and modeling of service-oriented architectures using REST and GraphQL APIs.
Implementation of scalable architectures: multilayer, microservices, modular monoliths, and hexagonal architecture (ports & adapters).
Efficient management of concurrency, threads, and processes for high-demand and low-latency environments.
Development of asynchronous and reactive systems focused on performance and scalability.
Continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) through automated pipelines.
System optimization through strategic caching, bottleneck minimization, and load balancing.
Advanced database management: SQL, NoSQL, graph, and in-memory storage with Redis.
Implementation of observability solutions: tracing, structured logging, metrics, and operational analytics.
Writing clear, precise, and up-to-date technical documentation for APIs and internal components.
Integration of security mechanisms following current standards (OWASP, JWT, OAuth2).

systems.title: Systems
items: Proficiency in Unix/Linux environments for development, automation, and advanced administration.
Virtualization and containerization of applications with tools such as Docker and Podman.
Infrastructure management and server configuration in self-managed or cloud environments.
Automation of operational tasks through scripting (Bash, Python) and orchestration tools.
Performance and low level programming using C language.

software_engineering.title: Software Engineering
items: Application of agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban) and DevOps practices for efficient iterative cycles.
Writing clean, testable, and highly maintainable code following SOLID principles and best practices.
Design and implementation of security controls at the software, infrastructure, and process levels.
Automation of technical and operational workflows to increase team efficiency.
Administration, support, and evolution of information systems in production environments.

frontend.title: Frontend and Graphical Interfaces
items: Basic knowledge of UX/UI.
Proficiency in CSS and libraries such as Tailwind CSS for atomic design.
Development of scalable and asynchronous graphical interfaces.
